msg.example: tasked agent WTN1LHHRYHFWHXU3 to run module credentials/mimikatz/logonpasswords

Author: @xorrior
example.Description: This module will dump any saved passwords from Firefox to the console. This should work for any versionof Firefox above version 32. This will only be successful if the master password is blank or has not been set.
example.Name: collection/FoxDump

Agent.Description: Agent to run the module on.

example.name: 3GHZPWEGADMT2KPA
example.user_agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; Trident/7.0; rv:11.0) like Gecko

DefaultLostLimit.Description: Number of missed checkins before exiting

DefaultProfile.Description: Default communication profile for the agent.
DefaultProfile.Value: /admin/get.php,/news.asp,/login/process.jsp|Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; Trident/7.0; rv:11.0) like Gecko

KillDate.Description: Date for the listener to exit (MM/dd/yyyy).

RedirectTarget.Description: Listener target to redirect to for pivot/hop.

StagingKey.Description: Staging key for initial agent negotiation.

Type.Description: Listener type (native, pivot, hop, foreign, meter).

WorkingHours.Description: Hours for the agent to operate (09:00-17:00).

Author: @harmj0y
example.Description: Generates a ducky script that runes a one-liner stage0 launcher for Empire.
example.Name: ducky

Proxy.Description: Proxy to use for request (default, none, or other).

ProxyCreds.Description: Proxy credentials ([domain\]username:password) to use for request (default, none, or other).

StagerRetries.Description: Times for the stager to retry connecting.

UserAgent.Description: User-agent string to use for the staging request (default, none, or other).

example.default_profile: /admin/get.php,/news.asp,/login/process.jsp|Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; Trident/7.0; rv:11.0) like Gecko
example.name: test

example.default_profile: /admin/get.php,/news.asp,/login/process.jsp|Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; Trident/7.0; rv:11.0) like Gecko
